name: Endor Awakens
storyline: Deep within Endor, where shadows stretch long and the whispers of ancient legends still echo, chaos has awakened. After Mordoth’s fall, the magic that once kept balance has faded, leaving the dungeons overrun with corrupted creatures and forgotten secrets. Adventurers from all corners arrive seeking glory, but few return. Only those cunning and brave enough can unravel Endor’s mysteries, forge their destiny, and challenge the forces threatening to consume everything. Will you be the one to restore light to this world, or will you be lost in the darkness of its depths?
summary: Endor Awakens: Dungeon Crawler is a thrilling evolution of Depths of Endor, where chaos reigns in the changing world after the fall of Mordoth. In this Dungeon Crawler, you'll venture through procedurally generated dungeons, encountering new challenges and treasures with every step.

videos.name: Teaser
videos.title: Endor Awakens: Teaser — The Epilogue of Depths of Endor, Dungeon Crawler
